subject: Change of adress
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

I placed an order with you guys but accidentaly put in my old adress.
Would it be possible to change the shipping adress still?
Its about order SSN3285.
I would like to have it changed to:
Adress: Pastoor van Haarenstraat 14
Postcode: 5759RT
City: Helenaveen
Province: Noord-Brabant
Country: The Netherlands

Kind regards,

Tobias Mijer
